name: AS_GCM_CPS_ruleConditionContractCategory
description: Component for rule condition contract category
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!values: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value])
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_dropdownField(
    required: true,
    placeholder: "Choose contract category",
    choiceLabels: rule!AS_GAM_translateMultipleBundleKeys(
      bundle: ri!bundle,
      bundleKeys: ri!refData.refKey
    ),
    choiceValues: ri!refData.refDataId,
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    value: local!values,
    saveInto: {
      local!values,
      a!save(
        ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value],
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"({ save!value })
      ),
      ri!additionalSaves
    },
    label: if(ri!readOnly,"","Value"),
    labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly,"COLLAPSED","ABOVE")
  )
)
